Grace Amey-Obeng bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye guzobere ngwaahịa ịma mma Forever Clair.
Grace Amey-Obeng bụ onye guzobere na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Forever Clear Group

N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2017, ọ guzoro ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi ma nwee ọkwa nke National Treasurer nke Association of Ghana Industries, otu Ghana na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke nwere njikọ azụmaahịa afọ ofufo nke ihe karịrị ndị otu 1200 sitere na obere, ọkara na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ.
Dị ka onye ọchụnta ego, Amey-Obeng na-ekwusi ike na ọ dị mkpa maka "ọrụ enyemaka ụlọ ọrụ

dị ka ụzọ dị irè, atụmatụ na nke na-adịgide adịgide nke inye enyemaka dị mkpa na mpaghara mkpa dị mkpa".  Na 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche oche nke Universal Merchant Bank Foundation nke emepụtara dị ka ụzọ isi nyeghachi mba Ghana..
Na May 2017, a kwanyere ya ugwu na mmemme nke abụọ nke Ghana Women of the Year Honors na udi nke "Excellence in Business".

Amey-Obeng bụ onye isi oche nke Ghana Cosmetology and Wellness Federation, otu nke e hibere na mmekorita sitere na Ghana Ministry of Trade and Industry and Ministry of Tourism, Culture and Creative Arts, iji nyere ndị otu nọ na cosmetology na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike aka "  chebe ahụike nke ndị ahịa".
